quote: Your dreamers. You ridiculous children. You dancing grinning fuckups. Here is your bright future. Your earnest, saccharine hope. How does it taste dripping from the neck of everyone you love?
quote_letters: YOUR DREAMERS YOU RIDICULOUS CHILDREN YOU DANCING GRINNING FUCKUPS HERE IS YOUR BRIGHT FUTURE YOUR EARNEST SACCHARINE HOPE HOW DOES IT TASTE DRIPPING FROM THE NECK OF EVERYONE YOU LOVE
